paragraphs.title: Infodemics Data
paragraphs.html:
Public posts on Twitter, analyzed with state-of-the-art machine learning techniques for: (1) population emotional state (circumplex and OCEAN psychological decomposition); (2) bot/human classification; (3) news reliability.
Downloads:
  • Infodemics data related to the last available day and aggregated by country: .csv file

This data is released under CC-BY 4.0 license and allows to reproduce relevant infodemiological information such as the fraction of bots, the fraction of unreliable news and the infodemic risk index. Please visit the open repository (https://osf.io/n6upx/) and cite it as R. Gallotti, N. Castaldo, F. Valle, P. Sacco and M. De Domenico, COVID19 Infodemics Observatory (2020). DOI: 10.17605/OSF.IO/N6UPX

paragraphs.title: Other Data
paragraphs.html:
• Epidemics: publicly available data repository operated by the Johns Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering, based on data fusion from different sources, including WHO, CDC, ECDC, NHC and DXY.
  • Financial: publicly available data from Stooq and Yahoo Finance.
